name: SILENT HILL 2 - 20TH ANNIVERSARY DEMAKE
description:
A LITTLE PROJECT I'VE BEEN WORKING ON TO CELEBRATE SILENT HILL 2 

It has many bugs from the beta software but the majority of the game is in there... 

CONTROLS / W, S ,A, D- CURSOR MOVES JAMES

A BUTTON / ALT, Z, J- SEARCH/SELECT ITEM

B BUTTON/CTRL, K, X  - ATTACK/BACK

START BUTTON / ENTER- MAP

SELECT BUTTON / SHIFT - INVENTORY
